'''Clusterbloom Arrow''' is a [[Summon]] in [[Genius Invokation TCG]]. It is created by using by using a Charged Attack after using [[Vijnana-Phala Mine (Character Card Skill)|Vijnana-Phala Mine]] and gaining the Vijnana Suffusion status.
